function.name: create_contact
function.description: Creates a new contact in GoHighLevel CRM with lead qualification information. Use this after collecting the caller's name, email, phone, property address, city, postcode, and number of bedrooms. Always call this function once you have collected all the essential contact information.

phone.description: Contact's phone number in international format, e.g., +447700900000 (required)

city.description: City where the property is located (optional)

bedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms in the property, e.g., '2' or '3' (optional)

region.description: Region where the property is located - must be either 'London' or 'Dubai'
